init.title: Stremio Options
init.description: Configure update intervals, polling behavior, and Apple TV handover settings.

data_description.player_scan_interval: How often to check for player state changes (10-300 seconds)
data_description.library_scan_interval: How often to sync library data (60-3600 seconds)
data_description.polling_gate_entities: Select media players or other entities that control polling. When all selected entities are off/idle, polling is reduced to once per 24 hours. Leave empty to always poll at normal intervals.
data_description.enable_apple_tv_handover: Allow sending content to Apple TV
data_description.handover_method: Method to use: 'auto' or 'airplay' (recommended, requires pyatv), 'direct' (may work for HLS). Note: VLC deep links do NOT work on tvOS!
data_description.apple_tv_device: The name of your Apple TV for AirPlay (e.g., 'Living Room Apple TV'). Required for AirPlay method.
data_description.apple_tv_entity_id: The media_player entity ID for Direct handover (e.g., 'media_player.apple_tv_living_room')
data_description.show_copy_url: Show 'Copy URL' option when browsing streams in the media browser. Disable to reduce clutter.
